divs: sighting detailssent to me by my wife in colorado. i am currently working in afghanistan. please view this tape she made with the surveillance camera she has set up on our property. i would appreciate any advice you have. feel free to contact my wife at [email removed\cms\tg] thank you. it looks to me like something hanging in front of the camera. my wife has it all on camera.
Summary: Sent to me by my wife in Colorado glowing ball in our back yard by our barn
